entry.title: Friday: Chance of flurries. High minus 7. POP 30%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud with 30 percent chance of flurries. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 7. Wind chill minus 18 this morning and minus 13 this afternoon. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 11:00 AM CDT Friday 31 March 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Periods of light snow. Low minus 21.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Periods of light snow beginning early this evening. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 21. Wind chill minus 13 this evening and minus 30 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 11:00 AM CDT Friday 31 March 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Chance of light snow. High minus 8. POP 60%
